mapper.select: SELECT bm.menuid AS menuId, bm.`name` FROM base_menu bm, user_strategy us, ( SELECT bu.user_parent FROM base_user bu WHERE bu.userid = #{userId} ) pu WHERE pu.user_parent = us.user_id AND bm.menuid = us.menu_id AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user_strategy us WHERE us.menu_id = bm.menuid AND user_id = #{userId} )
select menuid as menuId,bm.`name` from user_strategy us,base_menu bm where bm.menuid=us.menu_id and us.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into user_strategy(user_id,menu_id,created_time) select #{userId},menuid,now() from base_menu bm where bm.menuid != 7
